text: Coffee was made in perfection, in between kopi and kopi poh, sweetness just nice. Interesting uncle!

Only $1.10 for a decent milk tea. This stall is at level 3, in front of the escalators. I canâ€™t think of anywhere else cheaper than this. This couple has been operating for about two decades. Do support them and follow me for more tips!

I was pleasantly surprised by the quality of my kopi siew dai at this stall. I'm not sure if it's because the auntie decided to make a fresh pot of coffee but the combination of coffee and milk was just nice and is much better than many other places by a long shot.

Will definitely be ordering kopi from this stall if I dine at taman jurong food centre in the future.

an auntie worked at the shop this morning. i ordered 1x teh si (hot tea with evaporated milk and sugar) and 1x kopi si peng (coffee with evaporated milk and with sugar) and the auntie asked whether small or medium for the kopi si peng. i thought medium and large meant the same, so i ordered large. didn't know their large meant HUGE.
taste normal local kopi si but this eas not too sweet, just nice and the drinks costed 3.8 sgd.

Location is Taman Jurong level 3.. the auntie has the worst attitude in the Universe!!!! She is utterly sarcastics when I ordered my coffee. It's like she is always complaining , shouting ,talking very very loud and forever had a very arrogant unhappy face and she just throw her temper at you ... NEVER NEVER BUY FROM HER !!
